result.prevName: Al Hammadi Company For Development and Investment

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Al Hammadi Holding Company provides various medical services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Medical Services and Pharmaceuticals Products segments. It establishes, maintains, manages, and operates hospitals and clinics. The company also provides emergency and ambulance services; and operates medical laboratories, radiology, and outpatient pharmacies. In addition, it provides medical and non-medical maintenance and logistics services to hospitals and medical centers, such as contact medicine; and subsistence and cleaning, as well as marketing services. Further, the company engages in the wholesale and retail trade of medical devices, supplies, and medicines. It operates three hospitals under the Al Hammadi Hospital name in Olaya, Al Suwaidi, and Al Nuzha districts of Riyadh. The company was formerly known as Al Hammadi Company For Development and Investment and changed its name to Al Hammadi Holding Company in August 2022. Al Hammadi Holding Company was founded in 1985 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
